name: Gran Trak 10 (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
name_original: Gran Trak 10 (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
description:
This is the 5th game I made from Game Gen and I really like on what I did with the game.

If you want to cross the finish the lap would sometimes counted or not when I test it out myself before it sometimes works.

Controls to the game

Up arrow=Accelerate

Down arrow=Reverse

Left arrow=Turn left

Right arrow=Turn right

That's all about it to the game reminder: the laps sometimes work for crossing the finish line refresh the game if it doesn't work.

Anyways hope you guys can enjoy the game I work a lot of this game.
